mapper.select: select bno,p_division,s_division,title,max_fund,end_date,company_name,unit,min_fund,now_fund, support, (end_date-start_date) now_date, start_date,progress,viewcnt,good from board where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update board set now_fund=now_fund+#{now_fund}, support=support+1, progress=((now_fund+#{now_fund})/max_fund*100) where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select A.* from (select bno,p_division,s_division,title,max_fund,end_date,company_name,unit,min_fund,now_fund, support, (end_date-start_date) now_date, start_date,progress,viewcnt,good, approve from board order by viewcnt desc) A where approve=1 and rownum < 6
mapper.update: update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
